subject: RE: [junit] code works with textui, but not with swingui/awtui
msgSnippet: Can you run under debug mode and find what exactly is throwing the null? ... http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
messageBody:
Can you run under debug mode and find what exactly is throwing the null?

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Alain RAVET [mailto:aravet@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, August 21, 2001 4:52 AM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [junit] code works with textui, but not with
> swingui/awtui
>
>
> Hi,
>
> As the subject says,
> I have code works with textui, but not with swingui/awtui.
>
> With 3.7, I get
> java.lang.NullPointerException
> at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
> at junit.runner.BaseTestRunner.getTest(BaseTestRunner.java:53)
> at junit.awtui.TestRunner.runSuite(TestRunner.java:393)
> at junit.awtui.TestRunner.start(TestRunner.java:474)
> at junit.awtui.TestRunner.main(TestRunner.java:315)
> at junit.awtui.TestRunner.run(TestRunner.java:320)
>
>
> the swingui/awtui are not vital to me, but I'd like to
> experience the
> green bar effect.
>
> Any idea.
>
> Alain Ravet
> Brussels, Belgium
>
